touna.login: xpath="//a[contains(text(),'登录')]" xpath="" xpath="//span[@id='invest']" xpath="//span[@id='borrow']" xpath="//span[contains(text(),'请输入您的手机号/邮箱/用户名')]" xpath="//span[contains(text(),'请输入您的登录密码')]" xpath="//input[@id='btn_login']" xpath="//a[@class='span iconfont f12']" <><> <><> <><> <><>
